## Rules
- Generate code using Python with type hints.
- Follow functional programming principles where appropriate.
- Keep functions small and focused.
- Add Google-style or NumPy-style docstrings for complex functions and classes.
- Ensure all generated code passes Ruff linting checks: `ruff check .` and `ruff format .`.
- Adhere to the project structure defined in `@file(.github/rules/2-structure-instructions.md)`.
- Use American English for all comments and documentation.
- Prioritize readability and maintainability.
- Follow PEP 8 style guide for Python code.
